channel.title: How do I create pots?
channel.description:
Alright well, I editted most of my server, such as reqs, minigames, specs, correct godswords..But I can't seem to get pots to work. I'm clueless on how to, anyone got tips, the base? Like the case, I have no idea where to start..Also if anyone could tell me how to get the to decrease, this would be perfect, Thanks.
:)

item.title: How do I create pots?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Ooh, Thanks, that helps a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I create pots?
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

Tits…

[code] public void CalculateMaxHit() {
double MaxHit = 0;
int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; //Strength Bonus
int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; //Strength
int RngBonus = playerBonus[4]; // Ranged Bonus
int Range = playerLevel[playerRanged];//Ranged
if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive
MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00162));
} else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive
MaxHit += (double)(1.15 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00162));
} else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled
MaxHit += (double)(1.15 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00162));
}
MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.1);
if (StrPotion == 1) { //Strength Potion
MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.001343);
} else if (StrPotion == 2) { //Super Strength Potion
MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0195);
}
if (StrPrayer == 1) { //Burst Of Strength
MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0047);
} else if (StrPrayer == 2) { //Super Human Strength
MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.009);
} else if (StrPrayer == 3) { //Ultimate Strength
MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0147);
}
if (FightType == 5 || FightType == 6) { //Accurate and Longranged
MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RngBonus * Range) * 0.00070));
} else if (FightType == 7) { //Rapid
MaxHit += (double)(1.35 + (double)((double)(RngBonus) * 0.000225));
}
MaxHit += (double)(Range * 0.027);

	if(FullDharokEquipped())
            {
	MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00166));
            }
	playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);
}
public boolean FullDharokEquipped() {
	if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716 &&playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718)
            {
	return true;
            }
	return false;			

}

public boolean FullGuthanEquipped() {
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)
{
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]Hope that helps solve your arguement. Btw, Patrick, you gotta add the cases, like this:

case 157: strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@whi@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(157, GetItemSlot(157), 1); addItem(159, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break;That’s an example FYI.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I create pots?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

[quote=“iceman327, post:13, topic:186202”]Directed at Le:

When you go into your character file and give it 150 strength do you hit higher?

What about when you edit it 1000?[/quote]
Actually, yes it does. Maybe the problem is that your shit server doesn’t have a proper max hit method?

Freelillou:

lol…logic has nothing to do with anything if you dont want it to…all depends on how you code it.

Logic has EVERYTHING to do about it.

[quote=“iceman327, post:11, topic:186202”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=248655.msg2087283#msg2087283 date=1204617421]

Using simple logic you would think that if a strength pot boosts strength…and the max hit formula is based off of strength…-.-

Yeah, I guess you’re right.

Le I know more than you do, so just end it now.

What does knowledge have to do with this?
[/quote]

Knowledge of private servers.[/quote]
No way in hell you know more about java than me, much less private servers.

Read full topic
